Home » 36P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 5 Upādinnattika » 5.1 Paṭiccavāra » 5.1.2 Paccayapaccanīya » 5.1.2.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Naāhāra
Upādinnattika
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Vibhaṅgavāra
Naāhāra
19.
2498Upādinnupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upādinnupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati naāhārapaccayā—  asaññasattānaṃ ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca…pe… . (1)
2499Anupādinnupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anupādinnupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati naāhārapaccayā—  bāhiraṃ…  utusamuṭṭhānaṃ ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca…pe… . (1)
